title: He Is Taking Performing In Bed To A Whole Another Level
itunes:title: He Is Taking Performing In Bed To A Whole Another Level
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley I’m a 32 year old married woman and I’d normally never write in to you, but I heard you cover a topic that I’m going through so I’m turning to you for help. It’s about an issue I’ve been having with my husband since the quarantine began. He and I were having sex more than usual and it was getting boring. I wanted to spice things up with role-playing..........
